                       java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> data,
                       QueryOutput queryOutput)
        Updates a book in firestore if it exist
        Parameters:
        oldBook - oldBook containing necessary data
        callback - callback function to be called to show the result of query
        data - data containing the updates to be made to the book
